name: KeysIn1
description: KeysIn1 provides you with more convenient experience when using softwares.You can also improve your productivity by sharing and downloading works on the Workshop.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 32 bit Processor: 1.0 GHz Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: DirectX 9.0 Compatible DirectX: Version 9.0 Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 100 MB available space Sound Card: DirectX 9.0 Compatible Sound
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7/8/8.1/10 (32 & 64 bit) Processor: 1.0 GHz Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: DirectX 9.0 Compatible DirectX: Version 9.0 Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 100 MB available space Sound Card: DirectX 9.0 Compatible Sound
